import React, { Component, useEffect } from 'react'; import styles from './Offers.css'; import Carousel from "../../../components/Carousel/Carousel"; import PageHeader from '../../../components/PageHeader/PageHeader'; import { FooterContainer } from '../../../containers/footer'; const scrollToTravel = (id) => { const element = document.getElementById(id); element?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }; const Offers = () => { return (

Welcome, Ally Customer!

Home

Food & Drink

Things To Do

Fashion

Beauty & Spas

Health & Fitness

Travel

More

); }; export default Offers;
